publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1202.1 Tommy Sheridan: Council Tax Collection-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1202) in the name of Mr Kenneth Gibson, insert at end " and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to abolish the discredited and deeply unfair council tax and replace it with the income-based local government tax, the Scottish Service Tax."
